name: Hide Or Die (Beta)
description:
Hide or Die (Game a week 10/Multi-Play/pair project)

Hide or Die is a horror multi-play game. The ghost player has to kill the human player, and the human player has to activate 5 magic circles in the level.

Both characters have their own skills to help them to win the game.

Ghost skills: Mouse(left) - Claws attack / Mouse(right) switch to human player's sight.

Human skills: Mouse(left) - Torch on & off / Mouse(right) - Ghost radar / Q - Set a temporary barrier
